events.message: Customer reported a car accident involving a collision with another vehicle on the highway, details recorded for processing.
The claim was successfully categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and keywords in the claim description.
An insurance agent was assigned to handle the vehicle collision claim and to guide the customer through the next steps.
Customer received confirmation that their auto accident claim has been acknowledged and is officially being processed by our team.
Request sent to the customer for submitting the police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and insurance card copies.
Customer submitted all requested documents including police report and photos showing the extent of the vehicle damage.
The investigation team has begun reviewing the provided evidence and statements related to the auto accident claim.
Investigation concluded with findings supporting the customer's claim; the collision details are consistent with submitted documentation.
A preliminary settlement amount has been proposed based on the damage assessment and policy coverage of the insured vehicle.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the timely processing of the claim and the clarity of the settlement proposal.
The claim was officially approved by the claims manager following a positive review of all investigation findings and documents.
Payment was issued to the customer to cover the repair costs of their vehicle as per the approved settlement agreement.
The auto accident claim has been closed successfully after full settlement payment and customer confirmation of receipt.
All records and documentation related to the concluded auto accident claim have now been archived for compliance and record-keeping.
